an7.78:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti.
an7.78:1.7: anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, seyyathidaṃ—ekampi jātiṃ, dvepi jātiyo …pe… iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
an7.78:1.8: Dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
an7.78:1.9: Āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an7.78:1.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu vinayadharo hotī”ti.
